where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'CABLE_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | NOT ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sa <* USEDIN ( pd , 'CABLE_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT.OF_SHAPE' ) | 'CABLE_MIM.' + 'CABLE_TERMINAL' IN TYPEOF ( sa ) ) ) >= 1 ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SELF . frame_of_reference . name IN [ 'physical design usage' ]
